description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Broadbeach, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Gold Coast Family Fun: Broadbeach Two-Bedroom Suites for Four Guests with Unlimited Dreamworld Entry
hotels.description: Soak up the Gold Coast’s beachside buzz at this sleek all-suite sanctuary rising above the action. Just steps from Kurrawa Beach and surrounded by Broadbeach’s top dining, shopping and entertainment, this coastal escape pairs laidback luxury with unbeatable convenience. Settle into your self-contained suite, with all the space and convenience of home. Then, step beyond the every day with an impressive suite of facilities, including two fitness centres, two sparkling pools, a private cinema for nights in and a BBQ area perfect for balmy evenings. When it’s time to explore, you’re perfectly placed for the Gold Coast’s best. Stroll to The Star Gold Coast, Pacific Fair or hop on the nearby G:link tram to reach attractions across the region. Enjoy unlimited entry to Dreamworld for all-day thrills, or take in sweeping coastal views from SkyPoint at the top of the iconic Q1 building - perfect for families or small groups of friends.

hotels.title: Elevated Sofitel Gold Coast Luxury Moments from Broadbeach with Resort-Style Pool
hotels.description: Spoil yourself with French-inspired luxury at this iconic Gold Coast hotel, just steps from the golden sands of Broadbeach and set among buzzing restaurants and boutiques. The five-star Sofitel Gold Coast Broadbeach delivers outstanding service and a long list of state-of-the-art facilities including the sophisticated Room81 restaurant, two spectacular rooftop swimming pools - one heated - a stylish bar and plenty more.

hotels.title: Sky-High Oceanfront Broadbeach Apartment Stay with Two Serene Swimming Pools & In-House Theatre
hotels.description: Soar above the bustling heart of Broadbeach at this high-rise retreat, perfectly situated along the Gold Coast's pristine beaches. Soak up breathtaking ocean vistas from the comfort of your plush apartment, take a dip in the hotel's two sparkling pools or cosy up with a movie in the private theatre. Epic sunsets await at nearby Kurrawa and Mermaid Beach, while Queensland's largest shopping centre, Pacific Fair, is great for some retail therapy.

hotels.title: Sparkling Broadbeach Suite Stay in Shopping & Dining Precinct with Pool, Sauna & Outdoor Spa
hotels.description: Embrace the easy-going glamour of the Gold Coast with a stay at Peppers Broadbeach. In the heart of Broadbeach's dining and shopping scene, just moments from the golden sands of Kurrawa Beach, this relaxing retreat offers stunning ocean views from each of the private balconies extending from the modern suites and apartments. Spend your days exploring the best local eats, spend an afternoon wandering the hotel's gardens, or take a dip in the pool followed by a sauna session.

hotels.title: Chic Broadbeach One-, Two- or Three- Bedroom Apartment Escape near Kurrawa Beach with Tranquil Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Discover the glamour of the Gold Coast and indulge in a rejuvenating stay in the heart of Broadbeach. The hotel is a short stroll from the golden sands and surf-friendly waters of Kurrawa Beach and the vibrant dining scene of Oracle Boulevard. After days of exploration, take a dip in the outdoor pool or indulge in a workout at the fully equipped gym. Savour the spectacular skyline views from your private apartment balcony, or venture to the nearby Pacific Fair Shopping Centre.
